paper_abstract: We study necessary and sufficient conditions for multirate, multicast, and wide-sense nonblocking (WSNB) log(2)(N, m, p) networks. We show necessary and sufficient conditions for different values of m. The results allow us to find a speedup requirement in the network for a given traffic load. We also present a sufficient condition for making the network nonblocking when a limit is imposed on the multicast group size. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. NETWORKS, Vol. 52(4),277-286 2008
paper_title: Multirate Nonblocking Multicast Log(2)(N, m, p) Networks
